xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: Notes to Financial Results: 1.The following ratios which form part of the Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2024, are reproduced below, as there are no rows designated for the same in the XBRL format: Ratio Quarter ended Nine Months ended 31st December, 2024 31st December, 2024 A) Current ratio 1.01 1.01 B) Long Term Debt to Working Capital 6.25 6.25 C) Bad Debts to Account Receivable Ratio 0.00 0.00 D) Current Liability Ratio 0.56 0.56 E) Total Debt to Total Assets 0.22 0.22 F) Debtors Turnover Ratio $ 39.92 39.55 G) Inventory Turnover Ratio $ 6.26 6.82 H) Operating Margin (%) 8.0 7.1 I) Net Profit Margin (%) 6.5 5.8 $ Ratios for the quarter / nine months have been annualised.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: 1. Q3 FY25 Segment Revenue includes Rs 5,873 crore GST recovered. Net Revenue is Rs 128,260 crore. 2. 9M FY25 Segment Revenue includes Rs 17,838 crore GST recovered. Net Revenue is Rs 396,645 crore. 3. Oil to Chemicals Segment results includes Interest Income pertaining to it's segment.
